title: Hotel Hill View
details: Set in Bāndarban, Hotel Hill View features 3-star accommodation with private balconies.

title: Bono Nibash Hill Resort
details: Located in Bāndarban, Bono Nibash Hill Resort offers 3-star accommodation with a garden and a restaurant. This 3-star resort offers room service and a 24-hour front desk.

title: Fanush Resort
details: Situated in Bāndarban, Fanush Resort offers 3-star accommodation with a garden, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service. All rooms have a patio with mountain views.
